project_name.justification: The text states the acquisition of Neutron Energy, Inc. which holds the Marquez-Juan Tafoya uranium project (“Juan Tafoya”).

company_name.justification: The buyer is identified as 'Anfield Energy Inc. (TSX.V: AEC; OTCQB: ANLDF; FRANKFURT: 0AD)(“Anfield ” or the “Company ”)'.

ceo_buyer.justification: The text quotes 'Corey Dias, Anfield’s CEO commented: “We are pleased to complete the acquisition of the Marquez-Juan Tafoya Uranium Project...”.'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: Anfield completed the acquisition of Neutron Energy, Inc., which holds the project. The text states: '...it has completed the acquisition (the “Transaction”) of Neutron Energy, Inc. (“Neutron”), a wholly-owned subsidiary of enCore Energy Corp. ... which holds the Marquez-Juan Tafoya uranium project...' This implies a 100% interest in the project via the acquisition of the holding company.

primary_commodity.justification: The article is titled 'Anfield Completes Acquisition of Uranium Project with Historical Indicated Uranium Resource of 18.1 Million Pounds'.

verified_article_link.justification: No article link was provided in the source documents. The content is verified to be about the correct project, Marquez-Juan Tafoya.

currency.justification: The cash consideration is specified in Canadian dollars: '...has agreed to pay C$5,000,000 in cash...'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The text states that Anfield 'has agreed to pay C$5,000,000 in cash (the “Consideration Payment”).'

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction consideration is defined by a cash payment and a number of shares issued, not a raw share value.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The transaction consideration is defined by separate cash and share components, not a single combined value.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The text states: 'As consideration for the acquisition of Neutron, the Company has issued 185,000,000 common shares (the “Consideration Shares”) to enCore...'

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were mentioned as part of the transaction consideration.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options were mentioned as part of the transaction consideration.

issued_share_price.justification: The transaction terms mention the number of shares issued (185,000,000), but not the price. Using the last traded price as a fallback, as seen in the detailed quote: 'Last: 0.1175'.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment in meters was mentioned in the text.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: No monetary exploration commitment was mentioned in the text.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) was mentioned as part of the transaction.

coverage_area_raw.justification: No coverage area was mentioned for the Marquez-Juan Tafoya project.

coverage_area_unit.justification: No coverage area was mentioned for the Marquez-Juan Tafoya project.

resource_size.justification: The article headline states: 'Anfield Completes Acquisition of Uranium Project with Historical Indicated Uranium Resource of 18.1 Million Pounds'. This is corroborated by the resource table which lists 'Contained Uranium (Mlbs U3O8): 18.1' for the Marquez-Juan Tafoya project.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer is identified as 'Anfield Energy Inc. (TSX.V: AEC; OTCQB: ANLDF; FRANKFURT: 0AD)'. TSX.V corresponds to the TSX Venture Exchange (TSXV).
